title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.20 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.20 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of sections
1806.21
-1806.25 of this Part is
to set forth general standards that shall be used by the commission to evaluate
all projects subject to review and approval by the commission pursuant to
sections
1806.4, 1806.5 and
1806.6
of this Part, and to
establish special standards applicable to certain water withdrawals, consumptive uses and diversions. Sections
1806.21
- 1806.25 of this Part
shall not be construed to limit the commission's authority and scope of review. These standards are authorized under sections
3.4
(2), 3.4
(8), 3.4
(9), and
3.10
of the compact and are based
upon, but not limited to, the goals, objectives, guidelines and criteria of the
comprehensive plan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1806.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
